name: India
board: Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI)
playingStyle: Known for strong batting lineup and spin bowling dominance.
majorAchievements: Won ICC Cricket World Cup twice (1983, 2011), ICC Champions Trophy twice (2002, 2013), and multiple ICC Test Championships.
fanBase: One of the largest and most passionate fan bases in the world.
notableRecords: Most consecutive wins in ODI cricket (21 matches).
recentPerformance: Reached the finals of the 2023 ICC World Test Championship.

name: New Zealand
playingStyle: Known for balanced team performance and strong fielding.
majorAchievements: Runners-up in ICC Cricket World Cup 2015 and 2019, Winners of ICC World Test Championship 2021.
fanBase: Loyal and passionate fans, known as the 'Black Caps' supporters.
notableRecords: First team to reach the final of the ICC World Test Championship.
recentPerformance: Won the ICC World Test Championship 2021.

name: South Africa
playingStyle: Known for aggressive fast bowling and strong fielding.
majorAchievements: Consistent performances in ICC tournaments but yet to win a World Cup.
fanBase: Passionate fans, known as the 'Proteas' supporters.
notableRecords: Highest team total in ODI cricket (434/4 vs Australia in 2006).
recentPerformance: Reached the semi-finals of the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup.

name: Australia
playingStyle: Known for all-round strength in both batting and bowling.
majorAchievements: 5-time World Cup winners, dominant force in world cricket.
fanBase: Loyal supporters, often referred to as the 'Baggy Greens'.
notableRecords: Record for most World Cup wins (5).
recentPerformance: Won the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup.

name: England
playingStyle: Aggressive batting and strong bowling attack.
majorAchievements: Won the 2019 ICC Cricket World Cup, a major force in limited overs cricket.
fanBase: Devoted fans, with passionate support, especially during Ashes series.
notableRecords: ICC World Cup winners in 2019.
recentPerformance: Reached the quarter-finals of the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup.

name: Pakistan
playingStyle: Aggressive in batting, with focus on pace attack and spin bowling.
majorAchievements: Won the 1992 ICC World Cup, consistent performances in ICC events.
fanBase: Passionate supporters, known as 'Green Shirts' fans.
notableRecords: World Cup champions in 1992.
recentPerformance: Reached the semi-finals of the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup.

name: Sri Lanka
playingStyle: Known for spin bowling and aggressive batting.
majorAchievements: World Cup champions in 1996, consistent in ICC tournaments.
fanBase: Devoted fans, known for their love of spin bowling and competitive spirit.
notableRecords: Muttiah Muralitharan holds the record for most wickets in Tests and ODIs.
recentPerformance: Reached the Super 12 stage of the 2022 ICC T20 World Cup.

name: West Indies
playingStyle: Renowned for aggressive batting and fast bowling.
majorAchievements: World Cup winners in 1975 and 1979, ICC T20 World Cup winners in 2012 and 2016.
fanBase: Massive support in the Caribbean and among diaspora.
notableRecords: Two-time World Cup champions and dominant in the early years of ODI cricket.
recentPerformance: Reached the Super 12 stage of the 2022 ICC T20 World Cup.

name: Bangladesh
playingStyle: Known for aggressive batting and improving pace bowling.
majorAchievements: Regular participants in ICC events, have consistently improved in ODI cricket.
fanBase: Very passionate, cricket is the most popular sport in the country.
notableRecords: Has regularly reached the knockout stages of ICC tournaments.
recentPerformance: Reached the Super 8 stage of the 2021 ICC T20 World Cup.

name: Afghanistan
playingStyle: Known for spin bowling, particularly wrist spin.
majorAchievements: Afghanistan has rapidly gained recognition, with impressive performances in ICC events.
fanBase: Growing support, particularly among Afghan diaspora around the world.
notableRecords: Achieved Full Member status in 2017, and participated in their first World Cup in 2015.
recentPerformance: Achieved Super 10 stage in the 2021 ICC T20 World Cup.

name: Ireland
playingStyle: Known for resilient performances, strong middle-order batting, and energetic fielding.
majorAchievements: Superb performances in ICC World Cups, including memorable wins over major teams.
fanBase: A passionate fanbase, particularly in Dublin and Belfast.
notableRecords: Memorable win against England in the 2011 ICC World Cup.
recentPerformance: Qualified for the 2023 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup.

name: Netherlands
playingStyle: Known for strategic play and upsets against larger teams, particularly in limited-overs formats.
majorAchievements: Notable wins in ICC tournaments, including defeating England in the 2009 T20 World Cup.
fanBase: A loyal fanbase in the Netherlands, with growing interest in cricket.
notableRecords: Memorable victory against England in the 2009 ICC T20 World Cup.
recentPerformance: Qualification for 2023 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup.

name: Zimbabwe
playingStyle: Known for gritty performances, particularly in ODIs, and emerging fast-bowling talent.
majorAchievements: Notable performances in ICC World Cups, including a famous win over India in the 1999 World Cup.
fanBase: A passionate fanbase, particularly in Harare and Bulawayo.
notableRecords: Famous win against India in the 1999 ICC World Cup.
recentPerformance: Notable performances in the 2023 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup Qualifier.

name: Namibia
playingStyle: Known for their determined and competitive spirit, with strong performances in global qualifiers.
majorAchievements: Notable qualification for the 2021 ICC T20 World Cup and competitive performances in ICC qualifiers.
fanBase: Growing fanbase, especially in the capital, Windhoek.
notableRecords: Strong performances in ICC Global Qualifiers.
recentPerformance: Qualification for the 2021 ICC Men's T20 World Cup and reaching the Super 12s.

name: United Arab Emirates
homeGround: Sheikh Zayed Cricket Stadium, Abu Dhabi
playingStyle: Known for their strategic play, with a mix of seasoned professionals and promising new talent.
majorAchievements: Strong performances in ICC World Cup Qualifiers and notable upsets in T20 cricket.
fanBase: Growing fanbase in the UAE with increasing interest in cricket.
notableRecords: Notable win against Sri Lanka in the 1996 ICC World Cup.
recentPerformance: Recent qualification for the ICC T20 World Cup and consistent performances in regional tournaments.

name: Scotland
playingStyle: Known for spirited and unpredictable performances, with a strong focus on fielding and pace bowling.
majorAchievements: Qualification for the 2007 ICC World Cup and notable wins in T20 tournaments.
fanBase: Passionate fans, particularly in Edinburgh and Glasgow.
notableRecords: Scotland's first appearance in the 1999 ICC World Cup.
recentPerformance: Qualifying for the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2021 and finishing strong in the qualifiers.

name: Oman
playingStyle: Known for emerging as a competitive team in recent years, with emphasis on spinners and steady batting.
majorAchievements: Qualification for the 2021 ICC Men's T20 World Cup.
fanBase: Small but passionate fanbase in Oman, with growing interest in cricket.
notableRecords: Memorable performances in ICC qualifiers and their first ICC Men's T20 World Cup qualification.
recentPerformance: Qualification for the 2021 ICC Men's T20 World Cup and competitive showings in the qualifiers.

name: Nepal
homeGround: Tribhuvan University International Cricket Ground, Kirtipur
playingStyle: Known for their enthusiastic and passionate play, often producing surprises in ICC tournaments.
majorAchievements: Notable qualification for the 2018 ICC World Cricket League Division 2 and competitive performances in ICC qualifiers.
fanBase: Growing fanbase with immense passion for the game.
notableRecords: Sandeep Lamichhane’s rise as a notable T20 bowler, one of Nepal's top performers.
recentPerformance: Qualification for ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2020 and solid performances in World Cricket League.

name: United States
homeGround: Central Broward Regional Park, Lauderhill, Florida
board: United States of America Cricket Association (USACA)
playingStyle: Emerging team with a focus on building young talent and creating competitive performances.
majorAchievements: Qualification for the 2018 ICC World Twenty20 Qualifier and competitive performances in ICC qualifiers.
fanBase: Small but growing cricket fanbase, particularly among the South Asian diaspora.
notableRecords: Jaskaran Malhotra’s record-breaking T20I century.
recentPerformance: Active participation in ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Qualifiers and improving performance in various regional events.

name: Papua New Guinea
playingStyle: Known for their competitive spirit, with a mix of youth and experience leading the way.
majorAchievements: Notable performances in ICC World Cricket League tournaments and qualification for T20 World Cup events.
fanBase: Growing support in Papua New Guinea and among expatriate communities.
notableRecords: Strong showings in World Cricket League tournaments.
recentPerformance: Participation in ICC Men’s T20 World Cup qualifiers and regional competitions.

name: Hong Kong
playingStyle: Known for resilience and determination, with an evolving team focused on T20 cricket.
majorAchievements: Notable appearances in ICC T20 World Cup qualifiers and competitive play in World Cricket League.
fanBase: Moderate fanbase, especially among the expat community in Hong Kong.
notableRecords: Strong performances in ICC T20 World Cup qualifying matches.
recentPerformance: Participation in ICC Men's T20 World Cup and consistent appearances in global qualifiers.

name: Jersey
playingStyle: A developing team with a focus on building youth talent for international tournaments.
majorAchievements: Participation in ICC World Cricket League and successful performances in regional tournaments.
fanBase: Small but growing, particularly within Jersey's local community.
notableRecords: Strong performances in ICC European competitions.
recentPerformance: Active participation in ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Qualifiers and regional tournaments.

name: Italy
playingStyle: A developing side that focuses on emerging talents and competitive cricket.
majorAchievements: Active participation in ICC European tournaments and World Cricket League qualifiers.
fanBase: Small fanbase, with a growing interest in the sport in Italy.
notableRecords: Competitive showings in European Cricket Championships.
recentPerformance: Participation in ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Qualifiers and ICC Europe events.

name: Germany
playingStyle: A developing team known for its disciplined approach to the game.
majorAchievements: Participation in ICC European tournaments and regional qualification events.
fanBase: Growing but still limited, particularly in German expatriate communities.
notableRecords: Strength in ICC European and World Cricket League qualifiers.
recentPerformance: Active participation in ICC Men’s T20 World Cup qualifiers and European competitions.

name: Kenya
playingStyle: Known for their determined and resilient performances, Kenya has been a prominent African cricket team.
majorAchievements: Reached the semi-finals of the 2003 ICC Cricket World Cup, one of Africa's most successful teams.
fanBase: A passionate fanbase, with cricket being one of the more popular sports in the country.
notableRecords: Semifinal finish in the 2003 ICC World Cup.
recentPerformance: Kenya continues to be competitive in African tournaments and regional ICC events.

name: Uganda
playingStyle: A developing team, with a focus on improving their international standing in African and global competitions.
majorAchievements: Active participation in ICC Africa and World Cricket League tournaments.
fanBase: Growing fanbase in Uganda, where cricket has seen an increase in popularity.
notableRecords: Competitive performances in ICC Africa tournaments and World Cricket League qualifiers.
recentPerformance: Active in ICC Men's T20 World Cup Qualifiers and African region tournaments.

name: Bermuda
playingStyle: A competitive team in regional tournaments, but with a focus on developing younger talent.
majorAchievements: Participation in ICC World Cup 2007, though with no wins in global ICC events.
fanBase: A small but passionate fanbase in Bermuda, where cricket is a popular sport.
notableRecords: Participation in the 2007 ICC World Cup.
recentPerformance: Active in ICC T20 World Cup Qualifiers and regional competitions.

name: Nigeria
playingStyle: A team with strong potential, often focused on youth development and improvement in continental cricket.
majorAchievements: Active participation in ICC Africa tournaments and regional qualifiers.
fanBase: A growing but limited fanbase, with cricket slowly gaining popularity in Nigeria.
notableRecords: Continued participation in ICC Africa tournaments and World Cricket League events.
recentPerformance: Participation in ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Qualifiers and regional ICC events.

name: Malaysia
playingStyle: A developing team with potential in Asian cricket, looking to improve their performance in ICC events.
majorAchievements: Participation in ICC World T20 events, but has not yet made a significant mark on the global stage.
fanBase: Moderately sized fanbase in Malaysia, with cricket becoming more popular in recent years.
notableRecords: Active participation in regional ICC competitions and global qualifiers.
recentPerformance: Participation in ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Qualifiers and other ICC Asia events.

name: Singapore
playingStyle: A steadily improving team in Asian cricket, focusing on youth development and improving their international standing.
majorAchievements: Regular participant in ICC World Cup Qualifiers and regional tournaments.
fanBase: A growing but small fanbase, with cricket gaining popularity in Singapore.
notableRecords: Active participation in ICC Men's T20 World Cup Qualifiers and other international events.
recentPerformance: Has made consistent progress in ICC events, recently participating in ICC Men's T20 World Cup Qualifiers.

name: Canada
playingStyle: A team with a mix of experience and youth, seeking to establish itself as a competitive force in world cricket.
majorAchievements: Played in ICC World Cup 1979, has also qualified for ICC World T20 events.
fanBase: Cricket is growing in Canada, with a decent following in cities like Toronto and Vancouver.
notableRecords: Part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup and World Cup Qualifiers.
recentPerformance: Active participant in ICC World T20 and ICC Americas tournaments.

name: Tanzania
homeGround: Leader's Club Ground, Dar es Salaam
playingStyle: A developing team, seeking to improve its regional standing in African and global competitions.
majorAchievements: Active participant in ICC Africa tournaments and regional World Cricket League competitions.
fanBase: Cricket is growing in Tanzania, particularly in the Dar es Salaam region.
notableRecords: Active participation in ICC Africa tournaments and World Cricket League events.
recentPerformance: Involved in ICC Men's T20 World Cup Qualifiers and other regional events.

name: Thailand
playingStyle: A growing team in Asian cricket, focusing on the development of female cricket alongside men’s cricket.
majorAchievements: Thailand Women's National Cricket Team has seen success in regional competitions.
fanBase: A smaller but passionate fanbase, with a focus on growing cricket in Thailand.
notableRecords: Growing presence in ICC Women’s T20 World Cup and regional competitions.
recentPerformance: Competing in ICC Women’s T20 World Cup Qualifiers and various regional tournaments.
